text: Converting to Numerical Features e Often want a real-valued example representation: 23 Van 22,000.00 23 22,000.00 23 Bur 21,000.00 23 21,000.00 22 Van 0.00 22 0.00 25 Sur 57,000.00 25 57,000.00 19 Bur 13,500.00 19 13,500.00 22 Van 20,000.00 22 20,000.00 * Thisis calleda “ ”or"“ ” encoding. * We can now interpret examples as points in space: — E.g., first example is at (23,1,0,0,22000).
